entry.title: $2680 // EARN LESS THAN $120k AND WANT A LUXURY BROOKLYN 1-BR FOR $2,680?
entry.content:
BRAND NEW RENT STABILIZED BUILDING IN PROSPECT HEIGHTS

LET US HELP YOU QUALIFY - NO BROKER OR APPLICATION FEES!!

This is an opportunity to live in a brand new Prospect Heights building for well below market rent. If you are a single-person household earning less than $120k per year, please contact me for further details and to schedule a viewing.

Hardwood Floors
Solid Stone Countertops
Luxury Fixtures and Finishes
Microwave
Dishwasher
5-Burner Stove
Heat and Hot Water Included
Pre-Wired for Verizon Fios
No Application Fee


THE BUILDING

24-Hour Doorman
Residents' Terrace with Community Garden
Residents' Lounge
Fitness Center
Laundry on Each Floor
Bike Room
Pet Friendly


***Please call/text/reply to Mark at show contact info for more info or to schedule a viewing***

entry.content:
ID: 17882

***Please text Vaner at five-1-six-two1-eight-17-three-nine and mention specific ad you're referring to. I'm a real person who can help you find your perfect apartment. I also have plenty of other listings in the same neighborhood, just ask! Foreign applicants welcome, we take insurent and or multiple months paid up front.

entry.content:
